contest-event.event-date:
July 23, 1900 D Pontypridd Contest (Class A)
Pontypridd Contest (Class A) 10 Test Piece Contest Pontypridd Contest pontypridd-contest-class-a
Mendelssohn [arr. Round]
Taff Vale Park, Pontypridd Trombones - Tillery. Best cornet - Ferndale. 6 bands competed. 10th annual South Wales and Monmouth Contest.
Aug. 13, 2013, 5:19 p.m. Aug. 27, 2018, 7:07 p.m.
1 Ferndale Samuel Radcliffe
2 Blaina & District Alexander Owen
3 Aberdare Town Jesse Manley
4 Abertillery Silver H. Bentley
Unknown Result Tillery Collieries Band John Griffiths
Unknown Result Burry Port Junior Band Rufus Fletcher
